item.title: Lista de Key-bindings/commands para que no se me olviden
item.description: Tmux Scroll: * Ctrol-b then [ then you can use your normal navigation keys to scroll around * Ctrl-b PgUp to go directly into copy mode and scroll one page up Git Crear branch $ git checkout -b newBrach Crear un branch basado en otro (Git-Flow) $ git checkout -b newBranch dev Cambiar remote url git remote -v git remote set-url origin https://github.com/USERNAME/REPOSITORY.git git remote -v
